title: Interpretation of a dream about flour in a dream about Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flour in a dream Al-Asamit Interpretation of dreams Flour in a dream If the dreamer is carrying a shawl of it, this indicates the field of concerns and responsibilities. The dream of seeing rice flour in a dream indicates an abundance of livelihood and the acquisition of abundant money. As for seeing many bags of flour in a dream, it is a sign of halal profit. And abundant nutrition. Interpretation of a dream about flour in a dream for a single woman. Flour in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she heard happy news. Seeing flour in general in a dream indicates the approaching date of an engagement. As for a dream about kneading flour in a dream, it is evidence of achieving goals and achieving ambitions. Interpretation of a dream about flour in A dream for a married woman: Buying a bag of white flour in a dream means feeding good offspring. Flour in a dream symbolizes abundant livelihood and luxury in life. But if a married woman sees that she has started preparing flour to make baked goods, this indicates happiness and abundance of sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about flour in a dream Pregnant woman: Flour in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the safety of the baby and the ease of childbirth. As for seeing palm trees made of flour in a dream, it is an indication that she will give birth to a healthy child. Seeing flour sifted or putting water on it indicates ease of childbirth. As for seeing a bag of flour in a dream, Evidence of feeding a male child. Interpretation of a dream about flour in a man’s dream. Seeing flour in a man’s dream is a sign of an abundance of money and many good things. A dream about selling flour in a dream is evidence that he is selling his afterlife to enjoy the refuge of this world. As for a married man, if he sees himself in a weak dream This indicates sustenance with good offspring. Flour in general in a man’s dream indicates happy events. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: The most important evidence for seeing travel bags in a dream

preview.html: Travel bags in a dream: Seeing travel bags is one of the things that indicates a lot of joy and optimism. As for seeing them in dreams, does it show fear and anxiety or an abundance of kindness and nourishment? They are scattered in many interpretations. Travel bags in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about travel bags refers to many interpretations and indications. Different, depending on the color of the suitcases, but if the dreamer sees that he is carrying an egg suitcase during his sleep, this is a sign that he will receive a lot. Happy events make him spend many moments of great happiness. While if the dreamer sees that he is carrying red suitcases in his dream, this means that he has heard a lot of bad news about his personal life that will make him enter a stage of severe depression. Many of the most important interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing suitcases Traveling in a dream indicates the approaching marriage contract with a righteous man with whom she will live her life in a state of financial and moral stability during this period. Travel bags in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing travel bags in a dream indicates the occurrence of many joys and happy occasions in one’s life. The dreamer, and seeing travel bags while the dreamer is sleeping indicates that he is living his life without major problems and crises. The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing suitcases in a dream indicates the end of the worries and problems that affected the dreamer’s practical life and made him lose interest a lot. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google. And get the correct interpretations. Travel bags in a dream for a single woman. Many of the most important interpreters said that seeing travel bags in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will hear a lot of good news about her life, whether personal or practical, and it will put her in a great situation. Comfort and confidence in the coming days, God willing. While many of the most important interpretation scholars have confirmed that if a woman sees that she is preparing travel bags and is in a state of extreme sadness during her sleep, this is a sign of radical changes that will occur in her life and will change. . For the completely better in the coming periods. Seeing travel bags in a girl’s dream means that God will fill her life with many blessings and happy occasions that will delight her heart and make her not feel the tension that she always felt before. Travel bags in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she sees her husband packing Travel bags, this is a sign that God will open great doors to earn livelihood for her husband, which will improve his financial situation in the coming periods. The most important interpretation: Experts say that seeing travel bags in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has sufficient ability to overcome any problems or crises that negatively affect her life or On the lives of her children. Seeing travel bags in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve many goals and ambitions that will make her improve the level of family income in the coming period. Travel bags in a dream for a pregnant woman if she sees

title: Interpretation of dreams that my dead aunt is alive in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that my deceased aunt was alive in a dream by Ibn Sirin. An aunt is considered one of the most important relatives of a person. A person's relationship with his aunt can be strong and we all know that a dream can be related to reality and that seeing dead people in a dream is one of the visions that worries its owner and shows a strong signal. Of the dreams that the dreamer seeks to interpret, to find out what this dream shows and what is its interpretation in the life of the fortuneteller, what is the interpretation of the dream in which I dreamed that my dead aunt was alive in a dream to a son? Sirin.Interpretation of Dreams: I dreamed that my dead aunt was alive in a dream. Many interpreters mentioned the logical interpretation of the interpretation of the dream in which I dreamed that my dead aunt was alive in a dream. This dream is considered one of the strangest visions that a person experiences and wants to know his good from his evil, and among the following interpretations: To see that the dead aunt is alive and she was giving me something, then this is a sign of abundance of goodness, success, and a wide life for the dreamer. If a man sees that his deceased aunt is giving To him a gift in a dream, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money and fulfill all his dreams and aspirations. The dream of a dead aunt being alive, and she is smiling and offering me food, was a sign of the happy joys to come for the dreamer. Anyone who dreams that his dead aunt is alive is A sign of good and abundant food and a happy life to come. See also: My experience with obsessive-compulsive disorder. Seeing the dead aunt alive and giving the dreamer a gift in the dream means that he will earn a lot of money and achieve what that person wants, and God knows best. This dream also conveys news that makes the heart rejoice. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing divorce in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing divorce in a dream Interpretation of seeing divorce in a dream on Mozaat website. Interpretation of divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted the dissolution of a marital relationship in general in a dream to change a person’s life, either for the better or for the worse. Seeing the dissolution of a marital relationship in a dream may indicate getting rid of Problems, disagreements, and eliminating misfortunes and sorrows that the dreamer is experiencing. Realizing the dissolution of a marital relationship in a dream can sometimes indicate a problem or a strong judgment that may go beyond insight. Ibn Sirin says: A man who sees that he has divorced his wife leaves his job and does not intend to return to it. Also Seeing the dissolution of a marital relationship in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will be accused of a major accusation or a serious quarrel with his friend. As for the one who thinks that he divorced his wife once, he will recover from his illness if he is sick. The man realizes in his dream that he divorced his wife three times and then dies. Interpretation of a dream about a vow of dissolution of a marital relationship in a dream may indicate transformation and abandonment of principles and ideas. Witnessing the dissolution of a marital relationship in a dream may indicate distance and separation from close people, and it is not necessary that the separation be between spouses. Watching the dissolution of a marital relationship in a dream and the happiness that accompanies it This indicates a change in circumstances for the better and the removal of burdens and problems. Read also: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dreamInterpretation of seeing divorce in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Basira, Al-Nabulsi interprets the dissolution of a marital relationship in a dream as separation, death, and departure from the world. A man who sees that he has divorced his wife once or Only twice, this indicates that the separation will be temporary and then you will return. Clarifying the awareness of the dissolution of the marital relationship in the dream towards Nabulsi, as it is often separation and distance from work, money, the husband, or relatives. The interpretation of the visual dream of breaking off the marital relationship in a sick person’s dream indicates that He will not recover easily and may die. Interpretation of a dream about the dissolution of a marital relationship for unmarried people. An unmarried woman who sees divorce in her dream indicates her separation from her lover or a quarrel between her and one of her friends. An insightful interpretation of the dissolution of a marital relationship in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate her marriage to a suitable person who has morals. And generosity. Seeing the dissolution of a marital relationship for a single woman in a dream and her happiness with her indicates that her life will change and change from single to engaged or married. Awareness of the dissolution of the marital relationship may indicate that she has overcome the sorrows and worries that she faces in her life. Interpretation of seeing divorce in a dream for a married woman if A married woman sees that her husband has divorced her, then this indicates that she will get rid of the problems and obstacles that she is going through with her husband. However, if she sees that she is dictating to her husband the dissolution of the marital relationship, this indicates that some positive changes will occur in her life. A married woman’s awareness of her husband’s divorce in... The dream may indicate an improvement in her basic situation and the achievement of victories and gains for her and her family. Realizing the dissolution of the marital relationship for a married woman in a dream indicates that her married life is full of joy and happiness.

Therefore, we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are interpretations of some working and irresponsible scholars. The site does not interfere in the interpretations, but rather conveys the interpretations of scholars. Whoever sees in a dream that he received a pen from someone can indicate positive changes that will occur in the dreamer's life during this period, and God knows best. Seeing yourself taking a pen in a dream may indicate the great happiness that the dreamer will achieve in those days, thanks to God. Anyone who dreams that he took medicine from someone can indicate the strength of his relationship with him and his strong love. Seeing someone taking medicine in a dream may indicate good changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this time. If a girl sees that she is taking medicine from someone, this may indicate happiness that will come in her life at that time, and God knows best. In the case of my personal opinion that he received a very clean chicken, it may indicate good changes in his life in those days It is possible that the vision of receiving slaughtered and clean chickens in a dream indicates a new experience that the dreamer will enter during this period. In my personal opinion, that he took a slaughtered chicken and cleaned the dream, it may indicate the ability of the dreamer to achieve the goals and aspirations of that period, and God knows best. Seeing a lock of hair in a dream may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life and that he will overcome. title: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a fish in a dream for a married woman, one of the most disturbing dreams that women fear in Hungary is to dream of fish due to inherited customs that fish in a dream brings nothing but bad, but there are many interpretations that differ according to the state in which the fish was when she dreamed of it. Therefore, through our article today on the interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman, we will look at all aspects of this dream in relation to scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen and explain the differences in details between them. Encyclopedia So follow us. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman Seeing fish for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin There are many interpretations of the same vision and the shape of the fish according to Ibn Sirin, and they are detailed as follows: If a married woman sees a fish in a dream, this indicates that her pregnancy is approaching. If the fish she dreamed of is dead, this is a sign of many problems that she will go through and accept in your life. But if the dream has a fish at the bottom of the sea, this indicates that the desire she has long dreamed of has come true. But if a married woman sees a fish lying on her bed, this indicates serious suffering, serious illness, poverty and many fears. As for if a married woman dreams of catching a brown fish, this indicates her success in her work and the abundant good that she achieves in her life and work. If a married woman buys fish from sellers in the market, this means that a large commodity is on its way and that this good is a reward for her for the hard work and great effort she made to achieve it. Interpretation of seeing fish for a married woman according to Ibn Shaheen If a married woman sees that her husband gives her fish, She will give birth to a boy from him in the year in which she had this vision, and God knows best. But if she sees that she is catching fish, cooking it and eating it, this indicates the abundance of goodness that will come her way and that she has achieved the success she has been seeking for a long time. But if the fish is grilled, this means that she will give birth to strong and powerful children. As for if a married woman sees a fish floating in the water, this indicates that sweet words soften her heart on the way to hearing and enjoying them. In the case of a married woman who fishes from murky, impure waters, this indicates that she will face many problems and events and meet unhelpful characters. But if in her dream she catches a fish without scales, this indicates that she will meet a treacherous character who is trying to take her. As for small fish, they mean, according to Al-Nabulsi, distress, poverty, anxiety and troubles. As for seeing dead fish in a dream, this indicates a desire that will not be fulfilled. But the rotten fish indicates an act that angers God. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman according to Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation does not differ from the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in the married woman who saw fish and ate it in a dream, where he indicated: If the dream in which the husband offers gifts or gives his wife a fish, this means that she will give birth to a child during the year in which she dreams. And if the vision revolves around

title: Interpretation of a dream about a house in a dream

preview.html: Many people get a big lake when they dream of a large or small house, as the dream of a house is one of the common dreams that has more than one interpretation, and that is why we chose to present to you today the interpretation of the dream of a house in a dream and what it symbolizes. The interpretation of a dream of a house in a dream. The interpretation of a dream of a house in a dream. A new house. In a dream: If you see in a dream that you are entering a new house in a certain place, with all amenities available, but the owner of your house is unknown. This indicates that if you are poor you will become rich and if you are rich you will become richer. If you feel anxious, you will be relieved, and if you disobey God, then you will repent. If the owner of your house is known, then this dream will apply to him. If a brick house catches fire, this indicates that the dreamer’s profit is neither permissible nor wrong. Old House in a Dream If an old house collapses on the dreamer, this means that he will inherit Houses or rooms symbolize the dreamer’s wives, and Ibn Sirin interprets a dream of sweeping or cleaning the floor of the house as the emergence of deep fears or sudden death, and some believe that it is the opposite. If a house is demolished in a dream, this indicates the death of its owner. If the dreamer sees that his house is larger Ordinarily, this indicates greater prosperity, especially with regard to women. Being in a new house in a secluded area suggests the dreamer’s grave. Interpretation of a dream about a house in a dream Imprisoned in a house If one sees himself tied up and imprisoned inside a house in a dream. This means that he will receive happy news , or it may mean that he is in good health. If one dreams that he is carrying a house on his shoulders, it means that he is taking care of a wife or wife in need. If one sees that his house is made of gold in a dream, it means that fire will burn it. If the house does not have a roof, as The sky, the sun or the moon can be seen in the manna, it represents the marriage of a woman from that family. If one sees a big house inside his house in a dream, it means that a righteous woman will live or move to that family to be a blessing for such a house. An iron house in a dream indicates a house Iron in a dream indicates that its owner has an excellent position and will also live for a long time. If the house is made of gold, this indicates that there will be fire. If you see a house in your dream from afar, this indicates that life will give you what you want, but after a long time. A familiar house in A dream: If you see a famous house in a dream, it symbolizes your life and situation, whether you are happy or sad. Such as a straight or crooked house, wide or narrow, tidy or messy and other characteristics related to behavior and personality.

title: Interpretation of seeing pyramids in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the pyramids in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s explanation: Seeing the pyramids in a dream indicates sadness, lack of joy, and bad news, and the dreamer may encounter a visitor. There is another interpretation that says that whoever sees the pyramids in his dream, this indicates that the dreamer follows fashions and myths and follows doctrines of distortion and legends.Interpretations Other to see pyramids in a dreamHere, the interpreters referred to the pyramids in the dream as indicating jihad and the pursuit of knowledge, that is, striving to learn the arts and innovate. They also interpreted seeing the pyramids in a dream as indicating places of luxury for a person, such as parks and gardens, as well as places of entertainment and luxury in which drunkenness, playing, and singing occur. The dream of the pyramids and their interpretation: Seeing huge pyramids in a dream is large, this indicates a long life. Seeing the pyramids for a man indicates the early marriage of a girl Beautiful and virginal. Seeing pyramids in a dream may indicate bad news that the dreamer will receive. Also, seeing pyramids in a dream indicates accepting advice and wisdom and can indicate heresy and staying away from innovations and following deviant doctrines. If the dreamer is a student and sees the pyramids in his sleep, this indicates The pursuit of knowledge and a high degree of science and the pursuit of arts and innovation. Here is the interpretation that seeing the great pyramids in a dream indicates nightclubs and places of luxury for people who get drunk, play and sing in them. Pyramids in a dream may indicate marriage to polytheists and those who follow heresies and the way of lying. It may Seeing the pyramids in a dream refers to churches and places that have many images that are woven and woven into them. There is an interpretation that seeing the pyramids is a sign of hearing unwanted news that conveys feelings of anxiety, sadness, and fear. Interpretation of a dream about pyramids: Whoever sees in his dream that he sees the pyramids, this indicates the graves of infidels and their high status. Among their people. The pyramids in a dream refer to the Pharaohs and what distinguished their era. The pyramids in a dream refer to tall buildings, fortifications, and castles, and may indicate the death of the era of the oppressor and criminals. There is an interpretation that says that seeing the pyramids in a dream indicates the migration of the place and the abandonment of its owners. The pyramids are considered a sign of An important and great achievement is completed in the life of the person who has the vision. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing the pyramids in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we receive your comments through the site and we will give you the interpretation as quickly as possible.

title: I dreamed that my ex-boyfriend was talking to me through excellent interpreters

preview.html: I dreamed that my friend was talking to me is among the dreams that girls may visit during sleep, which makes them feel a desire to return to their beloved, but this is not always the interpretation of the dream, as it holds for interpretive scholars much evidence according to the details contained in it. I dreamed that my ex-boyfriend was talking to me. I dreamed that my ex-boyfriend was talking to me several times as evidence of the dreamer’s success in overcoming the current period of her life, in which difficulties and problems abound, with her patience and frequent supplication to God Almighty, along with diligent and diligent work. A dream of a former lover can also indicate that the dreamer will get rid of the reasons for her disappointment and sadness in life and this will help her in the coming days to achieve the goals that she has always dreamed of. A dream of a former lover can only be an indication that the dreamer’s mind is still occupied with the past and with the man. The one she broke up with, and here she must try to forget him and engage in her life more than before. I dreamed that my ex-boyfriend was talking to me about Ibn Sirin. I dreamed that my ex-boyfriend was talking to me, indicating many meanings of Ibn Sirin depending on the dreamer’s condition, and it also helps the dreamer to overcome a crisis. Great in her life and back on the straight path again. Sometimes a dream of a former lover talking to me indicates that in the coming days of her life the mantra will be able to overcome the fears and psychological pain that she feels and that she will finally enjoy peace and tranquility, only she needs to get closer to God Almighty. Many prayers for his good condition and peace of mind. I dreamed that my ex-boyfriend was talking to me in private. I dreamed of an ex-boyfriend talking to me. For an unmarried girl, this is confirmation that she is still thinking about this lover, and here she must stop thinking about him and hope for his return, and instead focus on her life and success, and pray to God Almighty to compensate her. Good. A dream about a former lover who spoke to me may indicate that a single girl may be able to meet another good man and that she will marry him soon and their life together will become a happy life by God Almighty’s command, but if she is. Already in contact with another person, speaking from the ex-lover in the dream shows her inability to reach an understanding with the new man and that she is constantly thinking about getting rid of her relationship with him, and here the dreamer must review herself and determine her position. The dream of the ex-lover talking to me and asking me to come back again is evidence of That a woman is exposed to some disputes with her family, which requires her to calm down and think carefully, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a former lover and a conversation with him about being alone. Seeing the former lover talking to me and the vision responding to him in the conversation and talking to him is also evidence that he regrets more now what he did in the past, and here He must return to God Almighty and ask for forgiveness and pardon. As well as praying for what is good. I dreamed that my ex-boyfriend was calling me a married woman. I dreamed of a former lover talking to me while I was exchanging conversations with him about a married woman, which is evidence of...
